<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This contains code to emit diagnostic messages for potentially incorrect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// usage of the llvm.expect intrinsic. This utility extracts the threshold</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values from metadata associated with the instrumented Branch or Switch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction. The threshold values are then used to determine if a diagnostic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should be emitted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// checkBackendInstrumentation - compares PGO counters to the thresholds used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for llvm.expect and warns if the PGO counters are outside of the expected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// range. It extracts the expected weights from the MD&#95;prof weights attached</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to the instruction, which are assumed to come from lowered llvm.expect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// intrinsics. The RealWeights parameter and the extracted expected weights are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then passed to verifyMisexpect() for verification</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param I The Instruction being checked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param RealWeights A vector of profile weights for each target block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// checkFrontendInstrumentation - compares PGO counters to the thresholds used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for llvm.expect and warns if the PGO counters are outside of the expected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// range. It extracts the expected weights from the MD&#95;prof weights attached</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to the instruction, which are assumed to come from profiling data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// attached by the frontend prior to llvm.expect intrinsic lowering. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ExpectedWeights parameter and the extracted real weights are then passed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// verifyMisexpect() for verification</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param I The Instruction being checked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param ExpectedWeights A vector of the expected weights for each target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block, this determines the threshold values used when emitting diagnostics</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a21de4796e674d8dabcea69242abe5005">checkFrontendInstrumentation</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// veryifyMisExpect - compares RealWeights to the thresholds used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for llvm.expect and warns if the PGO counters are outside of the expected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param RealWeights A vector of profile weights from the profile data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param ExpectedWeights A vector of the weights attatch by llvm.expect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a8677c5d2618fcf52eda43f5530decb6b">verifyMisExpect</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> RealWeights,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// checkExpectAnnotations - compares PGO counters to the thresholds used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for llvm.expect and warns if the PGO counters are outside of the expected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// range. It extracts the expected weights from the MD&#95;prof weights attached</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to the instruction, which are assumed to come from lowered llvm.expect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// intrinsics. The RealWeights parameter and the extracted expected weights are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then passed to verifyMisexpect() for verification. It is a thin wrapper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// around the checkFrontendInstrumentation and checkBackendInstrumentation APIs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param ExistingWeights A vector of profile weights for each target block</span></CodeLine>
